net.sourceforge.waters.model.base
Interface ProxyMarshaller

All Known Implementing Classes:
JAXBMarshaller, ValidUnmarshaller
public interface ProxyMarshaller

A helper class to read and write XML files.

The ProxyMarshaller is a simple wrapper that provides an easy way to convert between XML files and their corresponding object structures. The object structures obtained are called documents and all implement the DocumentProxy interface.

This abstract base class implements the core of the wrapper functionality, but is not intended to be used directly. Instead, use one of the subclasses depending on the type of document you want to handle.

Author:
Robi Malik

                        throws Exception
Load a document from a file.

Parameters:
filename - The name of the file to be loaded.
Returns:
The loaded document.
Throws:
JAXBException - to indicate that reading the XML file has failed for some reason.
ModelException - to indicate that the loaded XML could not be converted to proper classes due to serious semantic inconsistencies.
Exception
